parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name for which you want to enable the DNSSEC. Only the users of the paid editions of Alibaba Cloud DNS can enable this feature.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

Default value: en.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The DNSSEC status. Valid values:

*   ON: enables DNSSEC for the domain name.
*   OFF: disables DNSSEC for the domain name.
